title: LAN HAIR
body:
LAN HAIR
Lan Hair was founded in 2012 by Founder Ngọc Lan Trần. After 12 years of operation, through the passion and relentless efforts of the Founder and the team, Lan Hair salon has become one of the renowned salons in Hanoi and the northern region. IN 2024, Lan Hair Center approached us with the desire to rebrand and refresh its identity..

Year
2024

title: AMI PRESCHOOL
body:
AMI PRESCHOOL
AMI is a premium international preschool system in Vietnam that aims to be the first preschool network to focus on children's emotional intelligence development.
We have assisted them in their rebranding efforts with this new identity, which is based on their core values and the modern, fresh, and continuously innovative spirit of AMI.

Year
2024

title: CX Innovation
body:
CXI – Customer Experience Innovation
It is a subsidiary company of Hehsed, a business consultant in Singapore, founded by Dr. Francis Goh. I am honored to have had the opportunity to design this identity for CXI. Here's how I implemented it.

Year
2024

title: Hệ Thống Nhà Thiocoslll
body:
Hệ Thống Nhà Thiocoslll
Việt Bảo – safeguarding the health of the Vietnamese community. The brand was established with the desire to protect the health of the Vietnamese people through the dedicated and knowledgeable consultation of a team of experienced pharmacists.

I developed the brand identity based on Việt Bảo’s core values, which include dedication, professionalism, and a commitment to community health. Việt Bảo's logo combines a heart shape with a cross symbol placed at the center, representing the pharmaceutical field that the brand serves.

Year
2023 - 2024

body:
Campaign Key Visual and Marketing Design
I started learning and investing in cryptocurrency, which led me to an opportunity to work at Bybit. Currently, I am a Graphic Designer for the Vietnam and Malaysia markets.

title: Catalogue
body:
THINK OUTSIDE THE CLIMATE CHANGE BOX

Climate Change Guidebook
The catalogue’s name is “THINK OUTSIDE THE CLIMATE CHANGE BOOK”. In this book, I point out eight things people may misunderstand about climate change, so I decided to choose this name. It means that we should change our perceptions and stereotypes that are wrong about the climate crisis. We should think outside the box, take responsibility, and act on climate change because every small action matters. We should change our minds, change our behaviors and attitudes toward this global issue.

Project Purpose
Student project for Practical Contemporary Practice module in 3rd year at British University Vietnam

Year
2022

title: MAMO
body:
MAMO - Vehicle Rental App
This project was designed and developed to help everyone rent a vehicle easily. Renting a vehicle is the best way to explore a new city is to get in the driver’s seat and enjoy some mem- orable rides. But renting a car can be expensive and difficult with all the complicated processes. That’s why MAMO is the perfect solution for travelers looking to explore a new city on their own terms. This app provides cars, bikes, and motorbikes that are available around the clock at affordable prices without any of the hassle.

Project Purpose
Student project for Major Project for Art Practitioners module in 2rd year at British University Vietnam

Year
2021

title: SIZERO
body:
Size Zero Campaign
“Size Zero” is an environmental campaign that focuses on creative products and designs in order to convey messages through interactive activities and visual experiences. I approach idea generation through different aspects of environmental issues. “The Zero” is the destination of many goals according to COP26 Nations Commitments, and to some extent, “Zero” is also a start, start to be aware, start to change.

Project Purpose
Part of designing process for Final Major Project at British University Vietnam

Year
2022

title: QIQ Vietnam
body:
Standees, posters, brochures
About the company: “QIQ is about reimagining transportation in smart cities — making shared transportation greener and more accessible to the masses.” My job there was basically designing standee, poster, card, brochure and do some other stuff. This is the first job in my life working as a designer so I was very excited.

Client
QIQ Vietnam

title: All My Love Is Gone
body:
“Gone” - T-shirt
I designed these T-shirts when my favorite singer released a song called “Gone”. She wrote the lyrics for two years, and I really like the lyrics, so I decided to design some T-shirts inspired by the lyrics to practice my skills.
